product_name: The North Face Warm Long Underwear Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With midweight fabric that dries quickly and feels soft next soft skin, The North Face Warm long underwear tights for women help keep you comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Stretchy fabric and flat seams let you move without restriction. The women's North Face Warm long underwear tights offer a relaxed next-to-skin fit that skims the body. Closeout.
short_description: With midweight fabric that dries quickly and feels soft next soft skin, The North Face Warm long underwear tights for women help keep you comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather.
